  • Uses of GameState in it.polimi.ingsw.model.state

    Subclasses of GameState in it.polimi.ingsw.model.state
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ConstructionState
    Abstract class representing the shared construction phase logic between rulesets.
    class 
    EndscreenState
    Ending point of any completed Galaxy Trucker match, displays all scores and stats for all playing players.
    class 
    LevelTwoConstructionState
    Represents a the construction phase of a Galaxy Trucker match, using level two flight rules, includes a ConstructionStateHourglass.
    class 
    ResumeWaitingState
    Special subclass of WaitingState needed to restart a saved game, only allows clients with the same names as the players that were playing before the ModelInstance that owned it got closed.
    class 
    TestFlightConstructionState
    Represents a the construction phase of a Galaxy Trucker match, using test flight rules.
    class 
    VerifyState
    Class representing the verification phase of a Galaxy Trucker match.
    class 
    VoyageState
    Space voyage phase of a match of Galaxy Trucker.
    class 
    WaitingState
    Starting point of any newly created match of Galaxy Trucker, waits for the expected number of clients and then automatically joins.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    GameState
    ConstructionState.getNext()
    Returns the state following the current one according to its internal logic, returns null if the game is finished.

    Initializes a SpaceShip for each Player.
